Posts.Content: Mar 25, 2016 08:08PM QuirkyCamper wrote: Thank you The breast specialist said she was able to move my lump, and that it was squishy, not firm. She said it is normal breast tissue, and that's why it blends in on the ultrasound. They reviewed my imaging from the other hospital, and said that everything looks fine. She said that small town hospital sends an MRI recommendation with every report. She said if she was concerned at all, she'd send me for one. I was told to come back in 6 months for a repeat mammogram. I feel some relief, but I'm still a bit worried. I suppose that will never go away, like I opened a Pandora's Box by finding a lump and researching.
Posts.Title: Preparing for an appointment with BS tomorrow QuirkyCamper QuirkyCamper
